summary: Tailog is a Forsworn Briarheart Follower
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=red]New Version 1.2 is up, see Changelog (File/Download Section)[/color][/b]

You always wanted a Forsworn Briarheart as a friendly follower?
Now you can!

Tailog is a Forsworn Briarheart which follows you, if you want to.

When you dismiss Tailog, he will stay where you\'ve left him.
Unless you give him a home (Mod: \"My Home is your Home\" - see FAQs).



[b][u]FAQs:[/u][/b]
[b]Q:[/b] [i]There is no \"follow me\" option available[/i]
[b]A:[/b] Try this: Save the game and load that savefile again.

[b]Q:[/b] [i]Where is Tailog?[/i]
[b]A:[/b] Depending on the installed Version: 
* Version 1.0 -> Whiterun Stables, 
* Version 1.1 -> Breezehome in Whiterun

[b]Q:[/b] [i]Tailog asks me to leave (when you\'re in Whiterun Stables - Only Version 1.0 affected!)[/i]
[b]A:[/b] Enter the House (Whiterun Stables) at another time (between 8pm and 12am)

[b]Q:[/b] [i]Will there be a female Forsworn Briarheart?[/i]
[b]A:[/b] Probably Not, there is only a male skin.

[b]Q:[/b] [i]Will Tailog die if you pitpocket his Briarheart?[/i]
[b]A:[/b] Tailog has no Briarheart in his inventory

[b]Q:[/b] [i]Is it compatible with other mods?[/i]
[b]A:[/b] It should be, it\'s just a new created NPC (unique!)
I have tried two other mods and it worked:
* \"[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18045]My Home is your Home[/url]\" by Volek
* \"[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12933]Extensible Follower Framework[/url]\" by Expired
* It should also work with any other mod.

Please consider that this is my first mod EVER, so I can\'t make new features (like female skins, etc.).
I just wanted to have a Forsworn Briarheart as Follower...
author: Dusa

files.name: Tailog Follower 1_1
files.changelogHtml:
changed Location from Whiterun Stables to Breezehome in Whiterun (easier access than stables)
added default weapons to tailog (before that he didn\'t have any weapons)
added book (nothing important in there)
raised radius (it\'s now 1024 instead of 512)

files.name: Tailog Follower - 1_2
files.changelogHtml:
added sleep package: If Tailog is dismissed, he will search for beds nearby (at 22pm)
added steward faction (you can hire tailog as steward for your hearthfire home)
